name: MedicalNutritionTherapyProcedures
title: Medical Nutrition Therapy Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for medical nutrition therapy (MNT) procedures),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use elements associated with medical nutrition therapy (MNT) procedures.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes used for MNT procedures),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes that do not describe MNT procedures)

concept.display: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes

Medical nutrition therapy; group (2 or more individual(s)), each 30 minutes
